Page.Name: ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc
Page.OnShow: COND=cl_language==German Calculate.gm9_LocalAdjustment=COND ? 10 : 1 COND=cl_language==French Calculate.gm9_LocalAdjustment=COND ? 10 : Calculate.gm9_LocalAdjustment COND=cl_language==English gm9_LocalOffset=COND ? 0 : 3 DisplayFrame.P.Left=DisplayFrame.P.Left + gm9_LocalOffset DisplayFrame.S.Left=DisplayFrame.S.Left + gm9_LocalOffset DisplayFrame.R.Left=DisplayFrame.R.Left + gm9_LocalOffset Spell_Cast_Percent.Text=ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.Spell_Cast_Percent Spell_Recovery_Percent.Text=ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.Spell_Recovery_Percent User_Melee_Casting_Speed.Text=ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.User_Melee_Casting_Speed User_Melee_Recovery_Speed.Text=ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.User_Melee_Recovery_Speed User_Ranged_Casting_Speed.Text=ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.User_Ranged_Casting_Speed User_Ranged_Recovery_Speed.Text=ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.User_Ranged_Recovery_Speed Calculate.Press=true

Button.Name: EnableInput
Button.Tooltip: Click here to enable editing of parameters. The input fields will be disabled again after you move your mouse away from the window.

Textbox.Name: User_Melee_Casting_Speed
Textbox.Tooltip: Enter the mean melee casting speed for your CAs (not saved). The preset value can be permanently edited in _ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.txt

Textbox.Name: User_Melee_Recovery_Speed
Textbox.Tooltip: Enter the mean melee recovery speed for your CAs (not saved). The preset value can be permanently edited in _ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.txt

Button.Name: ManualRecalc
Button.Tooltip: Force recalculation (will otherwise happen automatically each time you fight)

Textbox.Name: User_Ranged_Casting_Speed
Textbox.Tooltip: Enter the mean ranged casting speed for your CAs (not saved). The preset value can be permanently edited in _ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.txt

Textbox.Name: User_Ranged_Recovery_Speed
Textbox.Tooltip: Enter the mean ranged recovery speed for your CAs (not saved). The preset value can be permanently edited in _ProfitUI_AutoAttackCalc_Presets.txt

Text.Name: P
Text.Tooltip: Mean number of melee CAs possible between auto attacks with primary weapon

Text.Name: S
Text.Tooltip: Mean number of melee CAs possible between auto attacks with secondary weapon

Text.Name: R
Text.Tooltip: Mean number of ranged CAs possible between auto attacks with ranged weapon

Button.Name: Calculate
Button.OnPress: Left=Parent.Spell_Cast_Percent.Text Top=Parent.Spell_Recovery_Percent.Text gm9_TMP=Parent.User_Melee_Casting_Speed.Text * Left / 100 gm9_CASTING=Parent.User_Melee_Casting_Speed.Text - gm9_TMP gm9_TMP=Parent.User_Melee_Recovery_Speed.Text * Top / 100 gm9_RECOVERY=Parent.User_Melee_Recovery_Speed.Text - gm9_TMP gm9_DIVISOR=gm9_CASTING + gm9_RECOVERY Parent.DisplayFrame.P.Text=Parent.Primary_Delay.Text / gm9_DIVISOR Parent.DisplayFrame.P.Text=Parent.DisplayFrame.P.Text / gm9_LocalAdjustment Parent.DisplayFrame.S.Text=Parent.Secondary_Delay.Text / gm9_DIVISOR Parent.DisplayFrame.S.Text=Parent.DisplayFrame.S.Text/ gm9_LocalAdjustment gm9_TMP=Parent.User_Ranged_Casting_Speed.Text * Left / 100 gm9_CASTING=Parent.User_Ranged_Casting_Speed.Text - gm9_TMP gm9_TMP=Parent.User_Ranged_Recovery_Speed.Text * Top / 100 gm9_RECOVERY=Parent.User_Ranged_Recovery_Speed.Text - gm9_TMP gm9_DIVISOR=gm9_CASTING + gm9_RECOVERY Parent.DisplayFrame.R.Text=Parent.Ranged_Delay.Text / gm9_DIVISOR Parent.DisplayFrame.R.Text=Parent.DisplayFrame.R.Text / gm9_LocalAdjustment
